channel.description: Recent content in birthday on Vicky Lim

item.title: 37 lessons for 37 years
item.description: This is a collection of affirmations, mistakes, and reminders that I tried to post last year. They were pulled in loose chronological order from monthly reflections I’ve been writing for a while now. There is “nothing to attain.” I do not have to write a novel before I die, nor read 1,000 books, nor pass beyond grade 8 on the classical guitar, nor climb upward at work. It is ok to step away (and never return) from any voluntary work that stresses me out mentally, physically, and emotionally.
